Reduced Inequalities.reason: No evidence found in the course description related to reducing inequality within or among countries.

gemini_critique.critique: No revisions needed. Model B's analysis aligns with mine on some points, but my original assessment for Decent Work, Industry/Innovation, and Peace/Justice is more accurate based on explicit course text.
